nodes.text: Kallum was a Advozse male lieutenant of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY, Lieutenant Kallum and his squad attempted to put out the fires and remove the detonite charges from starship torpedoes in the Labor Valley. Attacked by enemy droids, the squad members were all killed, with Kallum the only survivor. He made it back to the nearest medical station and asked a Republic-allied individual to finish the job.
